title: Universal quantifier
text: Remember that epsilon in a ε-δ defintion is used to quantify the distance between the function and what the limit is equal to.
speech: Remember that epsilon in a ε-δ defintion is used to quantify the distance between the function and what the limit is equal to.
pacedSpeech: Remember that epsilon in a ε-δ defintion is used to quantify the distance between the function and what the limit is equal to.

title: Distance
text: The distance between the function and what it is equal to, N,in this case, cannot be negative, thus what must epsilon be?
speech: The distance between the function and what it is equal to, N,in this case, cannot be negative, thus what must epsilon be?
